Episodes.Title: The Honking
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: When the inheritance Bender claims in the Old Country isn't quite what he expected, the Planet Express crew has to find the source of an age-old curse.

Episodes.Title: War Is the H-Word
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry and Bender enroll in the Army to receive military discounts, but a war breaks out and the two friends are forced to serve on the front lines.

Episodes.Title: The Cryonic Woman
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, J. Stewart Burns
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry discovers his 20th-century girlfriend at the cryogenics lab, but problems arise when she wants them both to be refrozen for another 1,000 years.

Episodes.Title: Parasites Lost
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Ingesting a bad egg-salad sandwich leads to Fry developing a colony of parasitic worms in his bowels, which set out to make him smarter and stronger.

Episodes.Title: Amazon Women in the Mood
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Lew Morton
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Gigantic feminist Amazons give Fry, Kif, and Zapp a grueling workout.

Episodes.Title: Bendless Love
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: A sleep-walking Bender creates havoc with his uncontrollable bending and is sent to the Bending Factory where he meets Angelyne, a curvaceous fembot.

Episodes.Title: The Day the Earth Stood Stupid
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Jeff Westbrook
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: When flying brains invade, Fry is the only one who can save the Earth from destruction.

Episodes.Title: That's Lobstertainment!
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The Planet Express staff is amazed to learn that Dr. Zoidberg is related to a famous comedian. Bender convinces a robot soap opera star to finance a movie in the hopes of getting an acting award.

Episodes.Title: The Birdbot of Ice-Catraz
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Dan Vebber
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: The professor decides to ship hazardous cargo to the outer reaches of space, but the ship travels through some environmentally sensitive areas, including the penguin refuge on Pluto.

Episodes.Title: The Luck of the Fryrish
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ron Weiner
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry goes on a quest to recover his lucky 7-leaf clover after being convinced that his brother took over his identity after he was frozen.

Episodes.Title: The Cyber House Rules
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Lew Morton
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Leela returns to the Orphanarium and she meets with her friend Adlai Atkins after some years, and they begin to go out. Adlai is a surgeon and operates Leela to let her have two eyes, and Bender decides to adopt all the children a...

Episodes.Title: Insane in the Mainframe
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Bill Odenkirk
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry and Bender are mistakenly convicted of robbing a bank and are both sent to a robot mental institution.

Episodes.Title: Bendin' in the Wind
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After being crippled, Bender gets a new career as a folk rock singer. Fry, Leela, Amy and Dr. Zoidberg follow him around the country.

Episodes.Title: Time Keeps on Slipping
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: After being challenged to a game of basketball by the planet of the Globetrotters, Prof. Farnsworth creates a team of mutant, atomic supermen, but the side effects of their rapid growth endangers the universe.

Episodes.Title: I Dated a Robot
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry ignores the warnings of the Planet Express staff and starts dating a robot with the downloaded personality and holographic image of Lucy Liu. Leela and Bender make a disturbing discovery while trying to save Fry from his short...
